<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### LowerIntrinsicCall() {#a065baf0b078aae98e7c9703d6717e15e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IntrinsicLowering::LowerIntrinsicCall (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI)</>}>
Replace a call to the specified intrinsic function.

If an intrinsic function must be implemented by the code generator (such as va&#95;start), this function should print a message and abort.

Otherwise, if an intrinsic function call can be lowered, the code to implement it (often a call to a non-intrinsic function) is inserted <em>after</em> the call instruction and the call is deleted. The caller must be capable of handling this kind of change.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/intrinsiclowering-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/intrinsiclowering-h">IntrinsicLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/intrinsiclowering-cpp/#l00224">224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/intrinsiclowering-cpp">IntrinsicLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### LowerToByteSwap() {#a1e07c1aec365d4862fe2edef28aeec38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IntrinsicLowering::LowerToByteSwap (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Try to replace a call instruction with a call to a bswap intrinsic.

Return false if the call is not a simple integer bswap.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/intrinsiclowering-h/#l00042">42</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/intrinsiclowering-h">IntrinsicLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/intrinsiclowering-cpp/#l00467">467</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/intrinsiclowering-cpp">IntrinsicLowering.cpp</a>.
